QuestionText: Which HTML tag is used to define a hyperlink?
In CSS, which property is used to change the text color of an element?
What does the 'C' in CSS stand for?

What is the purpose of the 'alt' attribute in an HTML tag?
OptionA: To display alternate text if the image fails to load
OptionD: To link the image to a URL
CorrectAnswer: To display alternate text if the image fails to load

QuestionText: Which HTTP status code indicates 'Not Found'?

Which protocol is generally used for secure communication over the web?
What is the main purpose of the <head> tag in HTML?
OptionA: To define the main content of the webpage
OptionB: To specify metadata and links to styles/scripts
OptionD: To insert images into the webpage
CorrectAnswer: To specify metadata and links to styles/scripts

QuestionText: In responsive web design, what is the main purpose of media queries?
OptionA: To display different colors based on the browser
OptionB: To change the content layout based on screen size
OptionC: To enable animations on the webpage
CorrectAnswer: To change the content layout based on screen size
